title: A New Mixed Finite Element Method For The Cahn-Hilliard Equation
authors: Zhen Liu, Rui Ma, Min Zhang
abstract:
This paper presents a new mixed finite element method for the Cahn-Hilliard
equation. The well-posedness of the mixed formulation is established and the
error estimates for its linearized fully discrete scheme are provided.
Numerical experiments are given to validate the efficiency and accuracy of the
theoretical results.
